Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Latarcin 5 (Latarcin-5, Ltc5, Ltc 5, XXA, BBMm; natural AMPs; spiders, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram- E. coli DH5alpha, E. coli DH1 (MIC 0.6 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 18 uM), Gram+ A. globiformis, B. subtilis (MIC 0.6-1.1 uM).Toxicity:  Rabbit erythrocytes (20% lysis): 40 uM,  hemolytic. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Kozlov SA, Vassilevski AA, Feofanov AV, Surovoy AY, Karpunin DV, Grishin EV.2006
Literature Information.Title: Latarcins, antimicrobial and cytolytic peptides from the venom of the spider Lachesana tarabaevi (Zodariidae) that exemplify biomolecular diversity.
